item.title: By: Joseph Scott

item.description:

My apologies, it has been lost in various server moves that happened over the years.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Michael Hollstein.

My apologies, it has been lost in various server moves that happened over the years.

item.title: By: Michael Hollstein
item.dc:creator: Michael Hollstein
item.description:
Dear Mr. Scott The outputformat.tgz is damaged. http://josephscott.org/code/php/outputformat/outputformat.tgz
It can be found on http://joseph.randomnetworks.com/2007/01/18/ibm-developerworks-convert-xml-to-json-in-php/
Can you send me the files as a zip file, please? Best Regards, Michael Hollstein
item.content:encoded:
Dear Mr. Scott
The outputformat.tgz is damaged.
http://josephscott.org/code/php/outputformat/outputformat.tgz

It can be found on http://joseph.randomnetworks.com/2007/01/18/ibm-developerworks-convert-xml-to-json-in-php/

Can you send me the files as a zip file, please?
Best Regards,
Michael Hollstein
